description:
Tori’s future is literally up in the air when the damaged airship she is on takes a turn for the worse - just as Yuma’s opponent Cameron predicted!  Can Yuma save his best friend by winning his duel, or are the future photos Cameron snapped set in stone?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mirai o Kiri Hiraku Chikara! Kibou Hope Ray
The Power to Create the Future! Aspiring Emperor Hope Ray
未来を切り開く力! 希望皇ホープレイ
